thread.title: Great Location, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great Location, friendly staff - Review of Emeraude Louvre Montana Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: zgolfnerd
title: Great Location, friendly staff
text:
On a quiet street, great location to Louvre, Jardin des Tuileries, Seine and walking distance to many attractions including Notre Dame. Our room was comfortable and quiet. Bathrooms were updated. We had 2 tall windows that opened up, shudder style. The staff was very friendly and helpful! Would definitely stay again.
Room Tip: We stayed in Room 42 See more room tips
